ygData.subject: Healer Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: I am looking for a Cleric Guild... I play on the PvP server and I can t seen to find a Cleric/Healer guild. I just want people to be able to identify me as
ygData.messageBody:
I am looking for a Cleric Guild...

I play on the PvP server and I can't seen to find a Cleric/Healer guild. I
just want people to be able to identify me as someone who is aligned for
good and is not a PK type person. I do not want to get into heavy guild
commitments. However for Role Play purposes it is fun to have a guiding
philosophy. Any one..

Know of a guild that they would like representation on Rallas Zek
Are in a healer guild on Rallos Zek
Want to form a healer guild on Rallos Zek

Regards

Nynenom lvl 7 Cleric!
